column4: Qualcomm forecasts weak profit as demand slows for mobile chips
column5: Qualcomm Inc forecast current-quarter profit below analysts' expectations as demand weakens for its chips used in mobile devices in a slowing market.

column4: UPDATE 2-Qualcomm forecasts weak profit as demand slows for mobile chips
column5: * Shares down 3 pct after market   (Adds details  analyst comment; updates shares)
Jan 27 Qualcomm Inc's quarterly revenue fell 18.7 percent as demand for its chips for mobile devices declined amid stiff competition from Chinese and Taiwanese rivals.
